moves.name: Entrainment
moves.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

moves.name: Hammer Arm
moves.description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Arm Thrust
moves.description: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Comet Punch
moves.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Circle Throw
moves.description: The user throws the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Vital Throw
moves.description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Entrainment
moves.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

moves.name: Parting Shot
moves.description: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

moves.name: Sky Uppercut
moves.description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

moves.name: Hammer Arm
moves.description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Low Sweep
moves.description: The user attacks the target's legs swiftly, reducing the target's Speed stat.
